sense.def:
The placement of something
je dejanje, s katerim nekaj postavimo na določeno mesto.

seg.quote: I spent a week directing the placement of the boulders.

sense.def:
To get a placement
pomeni dobiti delo za nekaj časa, da bi pridobili izkušnje v delu, za katero se usposabljamo.

seg.quote: Amongst other placements, he spent some months at the Children's Hospital.
